selected_skills.name: extract_side_length_from_diagram
selected_skills.purpose: Extract the dimensions of the rectangle from the diagram.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to obtain the length and width of the rectangle from the diagram image.

selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: Calculate the perimeter of the rectangle using the extracted dimensions.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Apply the formula 2*(length + width) using the extracted dimensions to compute the perimeter.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: Format the final answer for output.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to format the computed perimeter into the required answer format.
